      • getContainerString

        public static java.lang.String getContainerString(BoxResourceType type)
        Given a resource type, get the string for it's REST API container. For example, given a BoxResourceType.FILE, it it's container would be "files".
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • consumeHttpEntityQuietly

        public static void consumeHttpEntityQuietly(org.apache.http.HttpEntity entity)
        Ensures that the entity content is fully consumed and the content stream, if exists, is closed. The process is done, quietly , without throwing any IOException.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to consume. Copied from org.apache.http.util.EntityUtils
